title: Nytårstorsk - bagt torsk med sennepssauce

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '25 g smør' is a type of butter. Among the available options, 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) and 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend) are the most appropriate matches. Both are processed forms of butter. 'Smør, saltet' has a slightly higher emission factor (3.3 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (3.2 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'smør, saltet' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate.

The ingredient '4 rødbeder (400 g)' refers to raw beetroot. Among the options, 'rødbede' (beetroot) is the most direct and least processed match. 'Rødbede, konserves' (canned beetroot) is more processed and therefore not the best match for raw beetroot. 'Rødkål' (red cabbage) and 'rødkål, konserves, uden tilsat sukker' (canned red cabbage, unsweetened) are different vegetables and thus not suitable matches.

The ingredient '1 dl mørk balsamicoeddike' is a type of vinegar. 'Eddike' (vinegar) is the most appropriate and direct match among the given options. 'Rødvin' (red wine) is a different product, although vinegar can be made from wine, it is not the most direct match. 'Chokolade, mørk' (dark chocolate) and 'mørksej' (pollock) are completely unrelated ingredients.

The ingredient '2 spsk sukker' refers to sugar. Among the options, 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' (granulated sugar (sucrose)) and 'sukker, brun farin' (brown sugar) are both types of sugar. 'Sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' has a slightly higher emission factor (2.7 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'sukker, brun farin' (2.4 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate. 'Sukkerært (mangetout)' (snow pea) and 'honning' (honey) are not types of sugar.

The ingredient '600 g torskeloin' refers to a cut of cod. 'Torsk, filet' (cod, fillet) is the most appropriate and direct match as it represents a similar processed form of cod. 'Torskelever' (cod liver) and 'torskelever, røget' (smoked cod liver) are different parts of the fish and have undergone different processing. 'Hornfisk' (garfish) is a different type of fish.

The ingredient '25 g smør' is a type of butter. Among the available options, 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) and 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend) are the most appropriate matches. Both are processed forms of butter. 'Smør, saltet' has a slightly higher emission factor (3.3 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (3.2 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'smør, saltet' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate.

The ingredient '1.5 tsk hvedemel' refers to wheat flour. 'Hvedemel, grahamsmel, fuldkorn' (wheat flour, wholemeal) is the most appropriate match as it is a type of wheat flour. 'Majsmel' (corn flour) is a different type of flour. 'Hvedekerner, hele/knækkede' (whole/cracked wheat kernels) are less processed than flour. 'Mandeldrik, ikke beriget' (almond drink, unenriched) is completely unrelated.

The ingredient '2.5 dl vand' refers to water. 'Vand, postevand' (water, tap water) is the most direct and appropriate match. The other options, 'vandmelon' (watermelon), 'tun i vand, konserves' (tuna in water, canned), and 'sild' (herring), are not simply water.

The ingredient '3 spsk hele gule sennepsfrø' refers to whole mustard seeds. 'Solsikkefrø, afskallede, tørrede' (sunflower seeds, shelled, dried) and 'sesamfrø, afskallede' (sesame seeds, shelled) are both types of seeds and are less processed than 'sennep, gul, færdiglavet' (yellow mustard, ready-made). Between sunflower seeds and sesame seeds, sesame seeds have a higher emission factor (7.3 kg CO2e / kg) and are therefore chosen to provide a conservative estimate. 'Solsikkeolie' (sunflower oil) is a processed product and not a seed.

The ingredient '6 finthakkede skalotteløg (75 g)' refers to shallots, which are a type of onion. 'Rødløg' (red onion) and 'forårsløg' (spring onion) are both types of onions and are raw, similar to the ingredient. 'Løg, hakkede, dybfrost' (onions, chopped, frozen) is a processed form. Between 'rødløg' and 'forårsløg', both have the same emission factor (0.8 kg CO2e / kg). 'Rødløg' is chosen as a general onion type. 'Spidskål' (pointed cabbage) is a different vegetable.

The ingredient '200 g koldt smør' is a type of butter. Among the available options, 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) and 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend) are the most appropriate matches. Both are processed forms of butter. 'Smør, saltet' has a slightly higher emission factor (3.3 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (3.2 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'smør, saltet' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af friskkværnet peber er ikke angivet. LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.005 kg, 1 * 0.005 kg = 0.005 kg
Mængden af friske krydderurter er ikke angivet. LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.025 kg, 1 * 0.025 kg = 0.025 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'friske krydderurter' refers to fresh herbs. 'Basilikum, frisk' (basil, fresh) and 'persille' (parsley) are both fresh herbs. 'Basilikum, tørret' (basil, dried) is a processed form. Between 'basilikum, frisk' and 'persille', 'persille' has a slightly higher emission factor (0.5 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'basilikum, frisk' (0.4 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'persille' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate. 'Fyldt frisk pasta' (fresh filled pasta) is not a herb.

The ingredient '100 g stegte bacontern' refers to fried bacon cubes. 'Grisekød, bacon, stegestykke' (pork, bacon, frying piece) is the most appropriate match as it is a form of bacon. 'Vegansk bacon' (vegan bacon) is a different product. 'Grisekød, flæskesteg, nakkekam med svær' (pork, roast pork, neck with rind) is a different cut of pork. 'Oksekød, spegepølse' (beef, salami) is a different type of meat and highly processed.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Ingrediens ikke fundet i generelle vægte. LLM-estimat er: 1 vagtelæg = 10 g, 4 * 10 g = 40 g = 0.04 kg.

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '4 blødkogte vagtelæg' refers to soft-boiled quail eggs. 'Æg, skrabeæg' (eggs, free-range eggs) is the most appropriate match as it represents a general category for eggs. 'Æggesalat' (egg salad) and 'nudler, æg' (noodles, egg) are processed products where eggs are only one component. 'Kaviar, lodderogn' (caviar, capelin roe) is a different product entirely.

instructions:
Marinerede rødbeder:
Smelt smørret i en gryde ved kraftig varme, men uden at det bruner. Svits rødbederne i ca. 2 min. Tilsæt eddike, sukker og salt og kog dem ved kraftig varme og uden låg i ca. 5 min. Kom rødbederne i en ovnfast skål og lad dem trække i ca. 2 timer og smag til.

Torsk:
Del torsken i fire lige store stykker. Læg stykkerne i et smurt ovnfast fad. Pensl torskeskiverne med smør og drys med salt. Bag fisken midt i ovnen i ca. 12 min. ved 200° - traditionel ovn. Lun rødbederne på en rist nederst i ovnen de sidste 5 min. – hæld evt. lidt af væden fra rødbederne ved serveringen.

Sennepssauce:
Pisk mel og lidt af vandet sammen i en gryde. Tilsæt resten af vandet, sennepsfrø og løg. Kog blandingen ved svag varme og under låg i ca. 10 min. Tag gryden af varmen og pisk det kolde smør i lidt efter lidt. Varm saucen op (den må ikke koge) og tilsæt salt og peber. Smag til.

Sådan anretter du Nytårstorsk:
Anret først rødbeder på fire tallerkner, kom torsken herpå, pynt med bacon, vagtelæg, krydderurter og server med sauce ved siden af.
